name: The Kirby Tarot - Digital
description:
This is a digitized version of The Kirby Tarot book and cards put together by Michaela Joffe. This version adds five card suits to each card with a general instruction of how to read the interpretation with the suit in mind.

Click the "Draw New Card" button to draw a new card and read the text to help guide your interpretation.

The About link shows more info about the deck and how to use it, pulled from the original PDF.
